title: Decorative Papers, Karakami-paper for 12 Months, 1990–95
description: -1) Ryoanji-style: paper with cream colored ground and pattern of stylized bird motifs hand-printed in gray, based on 18th century design; -2) Kuohiki-kumo: paper with cream colored ground and moire pattern hand-printed in silver mica, based on 16th century design; -3) Tsubo-tsubo; paper with cream colored ground and pattern of circular motifs hand-printed in gray, based on 17th century design; -4) Kawari-kanzesui: paper with cream colored ground and pattern of curvilinear lines hand-printed in gray, based on 17th century design; -5) Ashi: paper with cream colored ground and stylized rice plants hand-printed in silver mica, based on 19th century design; -6) Komatsuba: paper with cream colored ground patterned with groups of intersecting lines hand-printed in gray, based on 18th century design; -7) Sakura-karakusa: paper with cream colored ground and all-over pattern of meandering floral vines hand-printed in gray, based on 16th century design; -8)

tombstone.epitaph:
Decorative Papers, Karakami-paper for 12 Months, 1990–95. Hand-printed. 
Gift of Susumu Sakane. 1998-79-163-1/12
